__prompts__.CONTRIBUTORS: Does your project have more than one contributor?
__prompts__.RELEASE: Do you plan on cutting more than one release?
__prompts__.work_as_team: Do you plan on having other individuals/teams work with you?
__prompts__.maintain_as_team: Do you plan on having other individuals/teams maintain the project with you?
__prompts__.roadmap_as_team: Do you plan on having other individuals/teams plan the development roadmap with you?
